CustomField.description: Defines the threshold number of assignments for immediately calculating Project Monitor fields. If the number of assignments exceeds the value of this setting, Project Monitor fields are calculated using a batch process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the threshold number of assignments for immediately calculating Project Monitor fields. If the number of assignments exceeds the value of this setting, Project Monitor fields are calculated using a batch process.
CustomField.label: Update Project Monitor Fields Sync Limit
